snippet: KQED, a public television and radio station operator, the Knight Foundation and the Public Radio Exchange have united to provide financial and logistical aid for ventures to reinvent public media.
abstract: KQED, public television and radio station operator, Knight Foundation and the Public Radio Exchange will unveil Matter Ventures, start-up accelerator that will provide four months of financial and logistical support for budding media entrepreneurs.
lead_paragraph: KQED, a public television and radio station operator, the Knight Foundation and the Public Radio Exchange have united to provide financial and logistical aid for ventures to reinvent public media.

headline.seo: Partnership Offers Support for Media Ventures
headline.main: Partnership Offers Support for Media Entrepreneurs
headline.print_headline: Partnership Offers Support For Media Entrepreneurs

keywords.value: Knight, John S and James L, Foundation
keywords.name: organizations
